content: did we do anything to change the fonts for tooltips on zulipchat.com recently? something looks different, but i can't put my finger on it.

ah, cool, makes sense. i feel like the line-height is maybe a little too tall? it's also possible that i just don't like change, but something feels a little off about it to me, curious if others feel the same.

i guess it'll also probably look better once we increase the font size across the board.
Note that we still have both native browser tooltips and Tippy.js tooltips, and they look pretty different from each other.
Yeah, we probably want to continue thoughtfully migrating away from native browser title attribute tooltips in core UI (E.g. the timestamp hover behavior).
